thread.title_full: well positioned, confortable, good quality, friendly staff, reasonably priced - Review of Dock Suites Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Marco61Italy
title: well positioned, confortable, good quality, friendly staff, reasonably priced
text:
A small hotel with nice rooms, friendly staff, close to Metro (Policlinico) to easily get to Termini station and the city centre. Some room details could be improvables, depending on the rooms, but the beds / matresses are ok, it is silent, the breakfast is varied and the croissant very good. When you pay 25 euros per person this is a great value for your money!
Room Tip: Junior suite is good (with two bedrooms) See more room tips
